sources.name: Our World In Data based on Wrigley and Schofield (1981), Mitchell (2010), and UK ONS (2016)
sources.description:
Data published by Wrigley and Schofield (1981) "The Population History of England: A Reconstruction"; Brian Mitchell - International Historical Statistics (2010); UK ONS (2016)
Data publisher's source See individual sources for more detail
Links Brian Mitchell: http://www.eui.eu/Research/Library/ResearchGuides/Economics/Statistics/DataPortal/IHS.aspx#Access; UK ONS: https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/birthsdeathsandmarriages/
Retrieved June 2017

*Note: Our World In Data compiled the data from the above sources as follows: for the years 1541-1861: Wrigley and Schofield (1981); for the years 1862-2003: Brian Mitchell (2010); for the years 2004-2015: UK Office for National Statistics (2016).
